name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Dynamic Senior Node Engineer with 8 years of full stack development expertise, specializing in building scalable and high-performance solutions utilizing **Node.js**, **Sequelize**, **REST APIs**, **GraphQL**, **PostgreSQL**, and **RabbitMQ**. Proficient in modern JavaScript frameworks including **React** and **React Native**, as well as applying **Mocha** for testing robust applications. My solid background in software development is complemented by my ability to employ **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for containerization and orchestration, ensuring seamless deployment pipelines.
Demonstrated success in leading agile teams to execute projects that integrate cutting-edge technologies, focusing on security and compliance with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Skilled in implementing microservices architecture and event-driven systems, I leverage my extensive experience in **Python** to develop automation solutions that enhance operational efficiency and facilitate integration with cloud environments like Azure and AWS.

experience.responsibilities:

• Architected scalable, full-stack solutions emphasizing **React** for dynamic user interfaces, while integrating with modern state management libraries.
• Implemented testing strategies using **Mocha** for unit and integration tests, ensuring robustness across all modules of the application.
• Designed microservices-based architectures utilizing **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for container orchestration, enhancing system scalability and reliability.
• Collaborated with cross-functional Agile teams to meet sprint deadlines and align project goals with stakeholder expectations, ensuring timely delivery of high-quality software.
• Managed PostgreSQL databases to ensure optimized performance for large-scale applications, focusing on efficient data retrieval and storage.
• Developed real-time messaging features leveraging **RabbitMQ** to facilitate efficient communication between microservices.
• Involved in end-to-end development with a focus on performance optimization and security compliance across all platforms and APIs.
• Delivered high-quality code by adhering to best practices in software design, testing, and code reviews.

- Developed and modernized financial platforms leveraging **Node.js** (using **Express** and **Feathers.js**) to ensure a scalable and maintainable microservices-based architecture for high-volume transaction systems.

- Orchestrated containerized applications using **Kubernetes**, ensuring consistent deployment and scaling across cloud environments, achieving a **99.9%** uptime rate.

- Spearheaded the creation of real-time transaction monitoring and analytics dashboards utilizing **D3.js** and **Power BI Embedded**, increasing operational efficiency and enabling anomaly detection with a **30%** reduction in response time for alerts.

- Employed AI/ML techniques with **scikit-learn** and **XGBoost** to deploy fraud detection systems that analyzed transaction patterns, successfully flagging **85%** of suspicious activities.
- Developed machine learning pipelines for credit scoring and churn prediction, integrating model inference directly into backend services for real-time decision-making using **MLflow** and **Airflow**.
- Fostered an Agile development environment, leading cross-functional teams and improving project delivery timelines by **25%**.
